ovdesc.p: The MG.TYPE.TEXT file is used to record descriptive text for variuos codes used within the MORTGAGE module. These descriptions will be used for screen enrichment throughout the module.
This file allows for multi language translations of these descriptions.

desc.p: Describes the system code identified by this record.
This field allows for a description to be entered for the system code identified by the ID of this record.
This will be used as an screen enrichment for the system code identified by this record.
Uniquely identifies each record on this file.
This field identifies the system code whose description is to be recorded on this record.
Must reference a mortgage prodcut type, or additional payment element, defined on the MG.PARAMETER table.
